title: Actual services
content:
Each service definition contains zero or more actual services. The actual service is an instance of a service that benefits end users. It might be a business service or an infrastructure service. An actual service can also be a nontechnical service, such as a mailbox where you deliver letters and other physical documents.

Related topics

  • How to create an actual service record
  • How to edit an actual service record
  • How to delete an actual service record
  • Actual service workflow
